recommendations: Raibatak Chatterjee ‚ÄúI had the opportunity to work with Divjyot during our MBA days in ISB. She is one of the most natural leaders that I have seen who can lead execution of project, bring in insights to give the team an extra edge and round it up with a powerful presentation to drive in the team's viewpoint. Also notable are her skills of working in a team and seamlessly stepping into the different shoes as per the needs of the project. It has been a priviledge that I had her in my group for 2 terms and I hope that we get the opportunity to work together in the future.‚Äù

Ayushman (Ayush) Sen ‚ÄúDivjyot can be described in a few quick words - smart, sharp and hard working. I worked with her in ITC as well as Schlumberger and in the both the places she adapted to the tough work place conditions with ease. She is also very good with planning and implementation and made the team work more efficiently.‚Äù
